## Key Statistical Findings

All tests show highly significant results (p < 0.05), confirming that:

| Finding | Statistical Test | Result |
|---------|------------------|--------|
| âœ… ICT employment is genuinely growing | Linear Regression | p < 0.001 |
| âœ… Tech sector has persistently higher vacancy rates | Paired t-test | p < 0.001 |
| âœ… Countries with more tech jobs have higher wages | Pearson Correlation | r = 0.63, p < 0.001 |
| âœ… Standard labor market dynamics apply | Beveridge Curve | r = -0.95, p < 0.001 |
| âœ… COVID-19 accelerated ICT growth | Structural Break Test | p = 0.004 |

---

## Data Sources

All data sourced from [Eurostat](https://ec.europa.eu/eurostat):

- `isoc_sks_itspt` - ICT Specialists Employment
- `une_rt_a`, `une_rt_m` - Unemployment Rates
- `jvs_a_rate_r2` - Job Vacancy Rates
- `educ_uoe_grad02` - Tertiary Graduates
- `earn_ses_pub2s` - Median Earnings
